H0.text: The Bible tells of 3 wise men visiting Jesus after his birth, but in which of the Gospels does this appear. Matthew

H1.text: The Bible tells of 3 wise men visiting Jesus after his birth, but in which of the Gospels does this appear. Luke

H2.text: The Bible tells of 3 wise men visiting Jesus after his birth, but in which of the Gospels does this appear. John

H3.text: The Bible tells of 3 wise men visiting Jesus after his birth, but in which of the Gospels does this appear. Matay

A4.text: The Magi appear solely in the Gospel of Matthew.
